text: Sergei Vladilenovich Kiriyenko (; born 26 July 1962) is a Russian politician. He has been the First Deputy Chief of Staff of the Presidential Administration of Russia since 5 October 2016.Kirienko leaves Rosatom to join Presidential AdministrationWorld Nuclear News. 6 October 2016 He was the 30th Prime Minister of Russia from 23 March to 23 August 1998 under President Boris Yeltsin. ==References== Category:Prime Ministers of Russia Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:People from Abkhazia
title: Sergey Kiriyenko
